KBRI Kuala Lumpur Bantu Pemulangan Jenazah Afridza Munandar
02 Nov 2019, 22:18 by Muhammad Fida Ul Haq
Jakarta - Kedutaan Besar Republik Indonesia (KBRI) Kuala Lumpur berkoordinasi dengan pihak penyelenggara balapan Asia Talent Cup untuk memulangkan pebalap Indonesia Afridza Syach Munandar. KBRI membantu memberikan informasi terkait pemulangan Afridza kepada pihak sponsor.
"Baru saja dari Rumah Sakit Kuala Lumpur di mana almarhum dibawa langsung setelah kejadian. Bertemu dengan pihak Honda Indonesia dan Dorna (penyelenggara)," kata Koordinator Fungsi Protokol dan Konsuler KBRI Kuala Lumpur Malaysia, Yusron B Ambary, Sabtu (2/10/2019).
Yusron mengatakan pihak penyelenggara sudah menghubungi asuransi untuk memulangkan jenazah. Dia mengatakan sudah menyampaikan informasi yang diperlukan kepada pihak penyelenggara dan sponsor.
"Dorna sudah menghubungi pihak asuransi yang akan menunjuk perusahaan yang akan mengurus pengiriman jenazah ke Indonesia. KBRI telah menyampaikan informasi yang diperlukan terkait pengiriman jenazah kepada Perwakilan Honda Indonesia," tuturnya.
Sebelumnya, Afridza mengalami kecelakaan saat Race 1 ATC di Sirkuit Sepang, tepatnya pada tikungan 10 di lap pertama. Dia dilarikan ke sebuah rumah sakit di Kuala Lumpur setelah sempat mendapatkan pertolongan pertama.
Afridza tampil di Sepang untuk memperebutkan gelar juara Asia Talent Cup. Pebalap tersebut juga pernah memperkuat Astra Honda Racing Team dalam ajang Suzuka Endurance 4 Hours di Jepang.

Indonesian Embassy in Kuala Lumpur Helps the Return of the Body Afridza Munandar
02 Nov 2019, 22:18 by Muhammad Fida Ul Haq
Jakarta - The Indonesian Embassy in Kuala Lumpur coordinated with the organizer of the Asia Talent Cup race to repatriate Indonesian rider Afridza Syach Munandar. The Indonesian Embassy helped provide information regarding Afridza's return to the sponsors.
"Just now from the Kuala Lumpur Hospital where the deceased was brought immediately after the incident. Met with Honda Indonesia and Dorna (the organizers)," said the Coordinator of Protocol and Consular Functions of the Indonesian Embassy in Kuala Lumpur, Yusron B Ambary, Saturday (2/10/2019) ).
Yusron said the organizers had contacted insurance to repatriate the remains. He said that he had conveyed the information needed to the organizers and sponsors.
"Dorna has contacted the insurance company which will appoint a company that will take care of sending the body to Indonesia. The Indonesian Embassy has conveyed the necessary information regarding the shipment of the body to the Representative of Honda Indonesia," he said.
Previously, Afridza had an accident during Race 1 ATC at the Sepang Circuit, precisely at bend 10 on the first lap. He was rushed to a hospital in Kuala Lumpur after being able to get first aid.
Afridza appeared in Sepang to compete for the Asia Talent Cup title. The rider has also strengthened the Astra Honda Racing Team in the Suzuka Endurance 4 Hours event in Japan.
